about_the_game:
Embark on an eco-friendly journey and revolutionize your Bus Empire with our latest DLC "E-Bus & Green Energy". Expand your public transport domain with a fleet of cutting-edge E-Buses, paving the way for a sustainable future in the bustling cityscape.



Diverse Fleet of E-Buses: Choose from 10 new electric bus models, including nimble minibuses, standard solo buses, spacious articulated buses, and the impressive double-decker buses. Each model offers unique benefits and challenges, ensuring a rich and varied gameplay experience.

Smart Energy Management: Navigate the complexities of the energy market with electricity meters and customizable electricity contracts. Make strategic decisions to optimize your energy consumption and costs.



Sustainable Power Solutions: Go a step further in your green journey by installing photovoltaic systems. Harness the power of the sun to generate your own electricity, reducing your dependence on the grid and enhancing your eco-friendly image.

Advanced Charging Infrastructure: Implement an extensive network of charging stations at parking spaces and bus stops. Ensure your fleet is always powered up and ready to go, providing reliable service to your customers.

Environmental Impact Tracking: Keep an eye on your CO2 balance and earn environmental bonuses for maintaining a good climate balance. Your efforts towards sustainability won't go unnoticed!



Greenification Initiatives: Beautify your city and improve its carbon footprint with many new plant varieties. These decorative elements not only add aesthetic value but also contribute positively to the environment.

Dynamic Gameplay with New Events: Face new random events that challenge your adaptability and strategic planning. Each event brings unique scenarios, making every playthrough fresh and exciting.

Research and Innovation: Unlock numerous new research options to advance your technological capabilities. Stay ahead of the competition by continuously innovating and improving your operations.

Compatibility with Bus Modding: Personalize your experience further with bus modding compatibility. Customize your buses to your liking and share your unique designs with the community.
